Ingredients.3: 0.25 cups peeled, cored, and chopped apples

Ingredients.4: 1 (16.3 ounce) package refrigerated biscuit dough (such as Pillsbury Grands!®)

Directions.1: Line the air fryer basket with parchment paper and preheat to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).

Directions.2: Mix sugar and cinnamon in a small bowl. Place apples into another bowl and top with 1 tablespoon of cinnamon-sugar mixture. Set aside.

Directions.3: Separate each biscuit into 2, for a total of 16 pieces. Roll each piece into a 5-inch circle.

Directions.4: Place 1 tablespoon of the apples onto each round and pinch to seal. Roll into a ball and place seam side-down in the basket, making sure they are not touching. Spray with avocado oil and air fry until golden brown, 6 to 8 minutes. Turn balls over and air fry for an additional 4 to 6 minutes. Cook in batches if necessary.

Directions.5: Remove from air fryer, spray with avocado oil, and roll in remaining sugar-cinnamon mixture.
